plugin.name: 🤝 Shared Resources
plugin.description: Shared resources for NotePlan plugins. (There are no commands for users to run directly.)
plugin.author: jgclark + dwertheimer

plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: React Window calling back to plugin

plugin.commands.name: shared:logProvidedSharedResources
plugin.commands.description: Log resources provided in np.Shared/ folder

plugin.commands.name: shared:logAvailableSharedResources
plugin.commands.description: log locally available resources in np.Shared/ folder

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Shared commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
